injectables.name: ColorService
PaletteService
StorageService

methods.name: loadPalette
methods.rawdescription:
Load the palette saved in local storage.
If no palette is saved a random one is going to be generated.
methods.description: Load the palette saved in local storage. If no palette is saved a random one is going to be generated.

methods.name: loadTheme
methods.rawdescription:
Load the theme if it is stored in local storage.
If no theme was saved, the browser default theme is used.
methods.description: Load the theme if it is stored in local storage. If no theme was saved, the browser default theme is used.

methods.name: savePalette
methods.rawdescription: Save palette in local storage.
methods.description: Save palette in local storage.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.rawdescription:
Toggle between dark and light theme.
Force dark or light mode with parameter.
methods.description: Toggle between dark and light theme. Force dark or light mode with parameter.

classes.name: Color

methods.name: generateRandomColor
methods.rawdescription: Generate a random color with all shades.
methods.description: Generate a random color with all shades.

methods.name: getShade
methods.rawdescription: Get shade by index (50, 100, 200, ..., 900)
methods.description: Get shade by index (50, 100, 200, ..., 900)

methods.name: parseColor
methods.rawdescription:
Parse the json object to a color.
Throws exception if json object is no valid color object.
methods.description: Parse the json object to a color. Throws exception if json object is no valid color object.

methods.name: toString
methods.rawdescription: Stringify the color.
methods.description: Stringify the color.

classes.name: ColorConverter

methods.name: getHue
methods.rawdescription: Get hue for HSL or HSB format.
methods.description: Get hue for HSL or HSB format.

jsdoctags.comment: Difference between max and min values from [red, green, blue] / 255

methods.name: getLuminosity
methods.rawdescription: Get luminosity for HSL format.
methods.description: Get luminosity for HSL format.

methods.name: getSaturation
methods.rawdescription: Get saturation for HSL format.
methods.description: Get saturation for HSL format.

jsdoctags.comment: Difference between max and min values from [red, green, blue] / 255

methods.name: HEXtoHSL
methods.returnType: { hue: any; saturation: any; luminosity: any; }
methods.rawdescription: Convert from HEX string (#RRGGBB) to HSL format.
methods.description: Convert from HEX string (#RRGGBB) to HSL format.

methods.name: HEXtoRGB
methods.returnType: { red: any; green: any; blue: any; }
methods.rawdescription: Convert from HEX string to RGB values.
methods.description: Convert from HEX string to RGB values.

methods.name: HSLtoHEX
methods.rawdescription: Convert color from HSL format into HEX string.
methods.description: Convert color from HSL format into HEX string.

classes.name: ColorInterpolater

methods.name: generateDarkerColors
methods.rawdescription: Interpolate all darker shades from HSL color.
methods.description: Interpolate all darker shades from HSL color.

methods.name: generateLighterColors
methods.rawdescription: Interpolate all lighter shades from HSL color.
methods.description: Interpolate all lighter shades from HSL color.

methods.name: interpolateShades
methods.rawdescription: Interpolate 10 shades starting with one HEX color string.
methods.description: Interpolate 10 shades starting with one HEX color string.

methods.name: addColor
methods.rawdescription: Add a color to the beginning of the palette.
methods.description: Add a color to the beginning of the palette.

methods.name: generateRandomPalette
methods.rawdescription: Generate a new random palette with 'size' colors.
methods.description: Generate a new random palette with 'size' colors.

methods.name: parsePalette
methods.rawdescription:
Parse the json object to a palette.
Throws exception if not all values are given.

methods.description: Remove the color from the palette

classes.name: ToUnicodeVariantUtil

properties.name: variantOffsets
properties.defaultValue:
{
    'monospace': 'm',
    'bold' : 'b',
    'italic' : 'i',
    'bold italic' : 'bi',
    'script': 'c',
    'bold script': 'bc',
    'gothic': 'g',
    'gothic bold': 'bg',
    'doublestruck': 'd',
    'sans': 's',
    'bold sans' : 'bs',
    'italic sans': 'is',
    'bold italic sans': 'bis',
    'parenthesis': 'p',
    'circled': 'o',
    'circled negative': 'on',
    'squared': 'q',
    'squared negative': 'qn',
    'fullwidth': 'w'
  }

components.name: AppComponent

methodsClass.name: addColor
methodsClass.rawdescription:
Add color to the current palette.
If no palette exists, a new one is created.
methodsClass.description: Add color to the current palette. If no palette exists, a new one is created.

methodsClass.name: randomPalette
methodsClass.rawdescription: Set and display a new random palette with 5 - 10 colors.
methodsClass.description: Set and display a new random palette with 5 - 10 colors.

methodsClass.name: removePalette
methodsClass.rawdescription:
Remove the current palette from logic.
The palette can be restored if it was saved in local storage.
methodsClass.description: Remove the current palette from logic. The palette can be restored if it was saved in local storage.

methodsClass.rawdescription:
Remove color from palette and save the current palette to local storage.
If color is not present in palette nothing happens.
